processed.result:
You are given a list of $n$ integers ($2 \le n \le 100$) representing the heights of soldiers standing in a circle.  Find two soldiers whose heights have the smallest absolute difference ($|a_i - a_j|$). Output the indices of these two soldiers. 

If there are multiple pairs of soldiers with the smallest difference, output any one pair.

You are given a list of numbers representing the heights of people standing in a circle. Find two people standing next to each other whose height difference is the smallest. Output their positions in the circle.
